name: Aave Leverage Borrow
description: Supplies {{token}} to [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) to generate interest and earn staked AAVE tokens. Once unlocked, earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. This strategy also borrows tokens against {{token}} with leverage. Borrowed tokens are then deposited into corresponding yVault to generate yield.
